title: Credit Risk Scoring Model
description: Comprehensive credit risk scoring model for mortgage loan applications
content:
Credit Risk Scoring Model v2.0

This comprehensive credit risk scoring model calculates an aggregate risk score for mortgage loan applications based on multiple weighted factors.

SCORING FACTORS AND WEIGHTS:

1. Credit Score (30% weight)
   - 750-850: 100 points (Excellent)
   - 700-749: 80 points (Good)
   - 650-699: 60 points (Fair)
   - 580-649: 40 points (Below Average)
   - 300-579: 20 points (Poor)

2. Debt-to-Income Ratio (25% weight)
   - 0-28%: 100 points (Optimal)
   - 28-36%: 80 points (Acceptable)
   - 36-43%: 60 points (Elevated)
   - 43-50%: 40 points (High)
   - 50%+: 20 points (Excessive)

3. Loan-to-Value Ratio (20% weight)
   - 0-80%: 100 points (Standard)
   - 80-90%: 75 points (Elevated)
   - 90-95%: 50 points (High)
   - 95-97%: 25 points (Very High)
   - 97%+: 10 points (Maximum)

4. Employment Stability (15% weight)
   - 5+ years: 100 points (Highly Stable)
   - 2-5 years: 80 points (Stable)
   - 1-2 years: 60 points (Developing)
   - 0-1 year: 40 points (New)

5. Cash Reserves (10% weight)
   - 12+ months: 100 points (Substantial)
   - 6-12 months: 85 points (Strong)
   - 3-6 months: 70 points (Adequate)
   - 2-3 months: 50 points (Minimum)
   - 0-2 months: 25 points (Insufficient)

RISK CLASSIFICATION THRESHOLDS:
- Score 85-100: LOW RISK - Recommend APPROVE
- Score 70-84: LOW-MEDIUM RISK - Recommend APPROVE
- Score 55-69: MEDIUM RISK - Recommend REVIEW
- Score 40-54: HIGH RISK - Recommend ESCALATE
- Score 0-39: CRITICAL RISK - Recommend DENY

COMPENSATING FACTORS (Bonus Points):
- Exceptional credit score (760+): +5 points
- Substantial reserves (12+ months): +5 points
- Low LTV (70% or less): +5 points
- Long employment (10+ years): +3 points
- Primary residence: +2 points

NEGATIVE FACTORS (Penalty Points):
- Recent late payments in past 12 months: -10 points
- High credit utilization (50%+): -5 points
- Employment gap (3+ months): -5 points
- Multiple credit inquiries (4+ in 6 months): -5 points

scoring_factors.description: Total monthly debt payments divided by gross monthly income
Loan amount divided by property value
Years at current employer and employment type
